entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 40%
